Articles.Content:
Hi Guys,

I'm trying now for ages to dock on one of these B9 Docking Ports.

I even came this close:

http://i.imgur.com/V7JALiC.jpg

But they do not want to dock and I'm starting to dispair... Anyone got an idea what I am doing wrong?

Cheers,

Bio

Errh... could it be the fact that docking port on those size are pretty special?

I mean, there are 3 size, but a size 3 (2x2 configuration) could not link to 4 size 1 (2x2 configuration also) , even if they are perfectly align...

3[][] size 3 docking port

[][]

!=

1[]1[]

1[]1[]

!=

2[][]

2[][]

I hope this will help you solve your problem.

Thanks for the answer. But I am trying to dock size 1 on size 1 only. This should work as it is written in the description... But it doesn't

Edited December 13, 2014 by Biohazard666

Didn't try it myself, to be honest.

And in the picture you provide you seem to be docked (did not see the problem at first look) this seems really weird.
